backend/main.mo: Defines an empty Internet Computer Motoko actor with no methods or state.
feature_evidence.json: Machine-readable report describing implemented features, related files, components, test requirements, and confidence levels for custom domain UI and documentation.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Prewritten summaries of key frontend source files, styles, configuration, hooks, and documentation for build and feature planning.
frontend/docs/custom-domain.md: Detailed, provider-agnostic documentation explaining how to configure DNS records to point a custom domain to an Internet Computer application.
frontend/index.css: Global Tailwind CSS base styles defining light and dark theme design tokens, layout defaults, and color variables for the romantic theme.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry point that mounts the React application and sets page metadata and title.
frontend/README.md: Frontend project README outlining features, custom domain setup overview, and development prerequisites for the Valentine’s Day app.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Main React component implementing the Valentine’s Day interaction flow, evasive No button logic, success view, and access to the custom domain settings panel.
frontend/src/components/CustomDomainPane: Dialog component that guides users through custom domain setup by showing the current canister URL, accepting a domain name, and providing copyable DNS instructions.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: React hook that creates and caches an Internet Computer backend actor using React Query, handling authenticated and anonymous identities.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Implements a React context and hook to manage Internet Identity authentication, including login, logout, persisted identity loading, and detailed login status flags using @dfinity/auth-client.
frontend/src/hooks/useLocalStorage.ts: Provides a generic React hook that syncs state with localStorage in an SSR-safe way and listens for cross-tab storage changes.
frontend/src/index.css: Defines Tailwind CSS base, theme variables, and utilities, including a custom romantic pink color palette with light and dark mode support.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Application entry point that mounts the React app, wiring up React Query and the InternetIdentityProvider before rendering App.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Configures Tailwind CSS with dark mode, content paths, plugins, and an extended theme that maps CSS variables to design tokens and component styles.
project_state.json: Tracks high-level project metadata, existing features, and versions, describing the Valentine-themed ICP app, its frontend/backend scaffolding, and planned enhancements.
